comment._content: John Campbell Hamilton Gordon (1847-1934), and his wife, the former Ishbel Maria Marjoribanks (1857-1939): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Hamilton-Gordon,_1st_Marquess_... en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ishbel_Hamilton-Gordon,_Marchioness...

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: The Ogden standard. (Ogden City, Utah), 27 Nov. 1915. 4 P.M. CITY EDITION, page 1 chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn85058396/1915-11-27/ed-... reports on their presence in Ogden, Utah.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of Oct 7, 1915 select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F0061EFF395D1673... indicates that Lord Aberdeen and his wife would arrive that day on the liner New York. Sir Johnston Forbes-Robertson (in neighboring photo) arrived on the same voyage. So this photo is likely on the liner New York. Found!! See NYT of Oct 8, 1915 for a list of "Passengers from Liverpool." select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=FB0A17FC395D1673...

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks to both of you for your great research. We'll add some of the information to the record the next time we update.
